title: S13 Ep65: The Ghost Of Flight 401
itunes:title: The Ghost Of Flight 401
description:
It's Freaky Friday on BEYOND the DARKNESS. Today Dave & Tim take an ill fated trip with The Ghost of Flight 401 with guest Mark Anthony.

A jetliner crashes in the Florida Everglades, killing over 94 passengers along with the flight officer, Dom Cimoli. When engineers use pieces of the damaged plane to repair other jetliners, crew members and passengers experience haunting visions of the dead flight officer. While Cimoli's ghost seems terrifying at first, each crew eventually realizes that the spirit is warning them of impending disasters.

PLUS a Brand New Theater of the Mind!

Get the book here: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio

Visit Mark's site here: http://www.evidenceofeternity.com/

See the Flight 401 slideshow here: https://www.facebook.com/mediummarkanthony
